title: Loues load-starre Liuely deciphered in a historie no lesse commendable than comfortable, for all those that in their louely affections, haue by the enmitie of their friends, bene molested with the menacing meteors of crossing misfortunes. Leading also all kinde and true louers, that in their choyces are frownd at by froward parents, vnto the portfull paradise of pleasurde patience, and patient pleasures. By Robert Kittowe, student.
author: Kittowe, Robert.
publisher: Printed by Th. Creede dwelling in the Old Change, at the signe of the Eagle and Childe, neare Olde Fish-street,
